name: Rhythm and Rails
description:
An extremely short (~1 minute) prototype fusing rails shooter gameplay with the music synchronization of a rhythm game.

Very bare bones and with some bugs, but I wanted to release something to end the quarter.

Controls
  • WASD / Left Stick: Move ship
  • Up Arrow / Controller Top Button: Boost
  • Down Arrow / Controller Bottom Button: Brake
  • Left and Right Arrows / Shoulder Buttons: Hold to tilt, double tap to spin
  • Spacebar / Controller Left Button: Shoot
  • R / Start / Select: Restart
  • Alt-F4: Quit 😆
Music

Release: Hinkik – Hinkik-explorers

Quarterly Made Games HK

Made for the Winter 21 session of Quarterly Made Games HK.

Quarterly Made Games HK (@QMGHong Kong) is a game development collective based in Hong Kong with the aim of developing and finishing personal project(s) every 3 months. It’s low stakes, low pressure, and focused on motivating people with a shared environment and deadline.
